system.requirements:
Tier 2: Forbidden Lore (Xenos - Any) +20
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Knowledge
system.effect: Character can attempt any Forbidden Lore (Xenos) Test in which they are not trained in as if it were an untrained, non-specialist skill (Base -20 Test)

description.value: Character can attempt any Forbidden Lore (Xenos) Test in which they are not trained in as if it were an untrained, non-specialist skill (Base -20 Test)
